name: Prior service credit while per diem employee
text: Under such rules as are adopted by board of trustees, all members who formerly filled per diem positions after December 31, 1927, in the various counties as road maintenance workers, shall be allowed full prior service credit in the system for their per diem service. [L 1959, c 173, §§1, 2; am L 1960, c 22, §§2, 3; am L 1964, c 62, §2; Supp, §6-36.8; HRS ; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; am L 1982, c 165, §2(11)]
